headline: Barry Tuckwell, French Horn Virtuoso Who Also Conducted, Is Dead at 88
abstract: He was widely considered to be the finest player of his era and was said to have “inspired every generation of horn player for the past 70 years.”
lead_paragraph: Barry Tuckwell, considered by many to be the finest horn player of his generation, who displayed his skill in concerts all over the world and on dozens of recordings, died on Friday in Melbourne, Australia. He was 88.
